Summary Note:
Schneider Krämer Lechner and the RM crossed paths at a mutual friend's dinner party in Vienna. They discovered they had many common acquaintances and decided to explore business opportunities together.
Schneider Krämer Lechner is a 68 year old retired Tech Industry Leader from Austria. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
He was impressed by Julius Baer's global presence and expertise in private banking, leading to the decision to join.
Family Background: Schneider Krämer Lechner and Renate have been married since 1981. They are proud parents of 3 children: Andrea, Petra and Brandstetter.
Education Background:
Schneider finished secondary school at Bundesgymnasium und Bundesrealgymnasium Wien I in 1975.
He then attended New Design University St. Pölten, which he graduated in 1981.
Occupation History:
Schneider Krämer Lechner is a seasoned professional with over 44 years of experience.
Schneider Krämer Lechner launched his career as a Software Developer at Cisco Systems Austria GmbH, where he gained valuable experience from 1981 to 1984.
His subsequent role was as a Startup Founder at Microsoft Austria GmbH, where he continued to grow professionally from 1986 to 1989.
His tenure as a CEO at Cisco Systems Austria GmbH from 1989 to 1993 was marked by significant achievements and a deepening understanding of the field.
After 12 years of dedication, he assumed the role of Venture Capitalist at Ubitricity GesmbH in 1994, spearheading high-profile projects and mentoring junior colleagues.
He held the position of Tech Industry Leader at SAP Austria GmbH from 1996 until his retirement.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout his career, he saved 1370000 EUR, investing in various assets to grow his wealth.
He owns house in Gmunden, where he resides. It is worth 1200000 EUR.

In addition to his primary residence, he owns condo in Salzburg worth 1140000 EUR.

On top of that he inherited a beautiful townhouse in Bregenz, which could be used as a weekend getaway. It is valued at 860000 EUR.
He does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: In light of the above, we are optimistic about the client's financial future and career progression and are eager to welcome him as a new client.
